sentences.en: AIM To investigate the efficacy and safety of phosphorylcholine dexamethasone - coated biodivYsio stents.
sentences.cn: 目的评价以磷酸胆碱为载体的地塞米松涂层支架的安全性及近期有效性.

sentences.en: Efficacy measures include axial length, keratometric power and mean absolute refractive error.
sentences.cn: 有效测量值包括眼轴长度, 角膜曲率和绝对屈光误差值等内容.

sentences.en: He is too well aware of the doubts about the efficacy of nonviolence.
sentences.cn: 对非暴力主义的实效的怀疑,他是深有体会和感触的.

sentences.en: Interactions that are classified as adverse either compromise therapeutic efficacy, enhance toxicity, or both.
sentences.cn: 不利的相互作用是指两药合并应用后会降低疗效, 增强毒性, 或二者兼有.

sentences.en: It'soon proved its efficacy , and redeemed the leech's pledge.
sentences.cn: 药力很快便见了效, 看来医生说话算数.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe efficacy of Weichangshu in treatment of diabetic gastroparesis ( DGP ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察胃肠舒治疗糖尿病性胃轻瘫 ( DGP ) 的效果.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe exercise therapeutic efficacy in patients with primary discovery hypertension.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察高血压病运动康复治疗的疗效.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the efficacy of an operation to incipient pterygium.
sentences.cn: 目的观察初发翼状胬肉的一种手术方法的效果.

sentences.en: Objective; To observe the efficacy of MEBT in treating electric burn.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察湿润暴露疗法(MEBT)治疗高压电烧伤的效果.

sentences.en: Possess immaculate cover efficacy, effective punish and carry average Bright non - uniform complexion.
sentences.cn: 具有无瑕遮盖功效, 有效均整和提亮不均匀的肤色.

sentences.en: Recent medical studies confirm the efficacy of a healthier lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 最新医学研究证实了较为健康的生活方式的好处。

sentences.en: The clinical efficacy is evaluted with modified Webster scale.
sentences.cn: 临床疗效按帕金森病改良Webster10大症状评分法为观察指标.

sentences.en: The most commonly cited reasons for stopping the treatment were lack of efficacy and side effects.
sentences.cn: 最常举出的停止这种治疗的理由是无效和副作用.

sentences.en: The treatment has no efficacy in that disease.
sentences.cn: 这种疗法对那种疾病不管事.

sentences.en: They teach you efficacy at Harvard Medical?
sentences.cn: 他们是在哈佛医学院教你功效这个字的 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: the ability of something to produce the right result
